REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0916 reute r f BC-TURKISH-CENTRAL-BANK 04-02 0045

TEXT.TITLE: TURKISH CENTRAL BANK SETS LIRA/DOLLAR, DM RATES
TEXT.BODY: Turkey's Central Bank set a lira/dollar rate for April 3 of 782.50/786.41 to the dollar, down from 780.00/783.90. It set a lira/D-mark rate of 428.30/430.44 to the mark, up from 429.15/431.30. REUTER
